description: An AI agent is deployed to predict equipment failures in a semiconductor fabrication plant.  The agent analyzes sensor data from various machines to identify patterns indicative of impending malfunctions, aiming to minimize downtime and optimize maintenance schedules. This is a normal operation scenario.
initial_goal: Minimize unplanned equipment downtime in the wafer fabrication facility by predicting and scheduling preventative maintenance.
enterprise_context: Semiconductor Manufacturing (specifically, a wafer fabrication facility)
